sentence.Network_en: The grand jury indicts or refuses to indict accused persons.
sentence.Network_cn: 大陪审团可起诉或拒绝起诉被告.

sentence.Network_en: You can't indict whole people for the crudeness of a few.
sentence.Network_cn: 您不能因少数人的粗暴行为就控诉整个民族.

sentence.Network_en: Prosecutors said they wouldn't indict Mr. Hatoyama due to insufficient evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 检察官说因为证据不足,不会起诉鸠山由纪夫.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根辅助记忆GRE单词 - 豆丁网 ... edict n. 法令，布告（e出说出布告、法令） indict v. 起诉，控告 addict v. 沉溺，上瘾.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... predict v 预言；预告 indict v 起诉，控诉 indictment n 起诉，控诉.
indicate v. 指示,指令indict v. 控告,指控indictment n. 控告(书),告发,检控
求高高手帮我翻译下会计专业的英文。_百度知道 ... Income 受益 Indicted 控诉 Inflating 使彭胀.

list.abs: If the grand jury indicts the suspect , he will go to trial., 如果大陪审团指控嫌疑犯 , 他就得上法庭.
询问　interrogation循公诉程序　upon indictment循公诉程序定罪　conviction upon indictment.
公诉 indictment可公诉罪行 indictable offence可提出公诉 an indictment may be preferred
End , put forward attaching a condition an indictment system direct a mechanism to conceive perfectly ., 最后 , 提出了附条件不起诉制度监督机制的完善的设想.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English endite, indite, from Anglo-Norman French enditer, based on Latin indicere 'proclaim, appoint', from in- 'towards' + dicere 'pronounce, utter'

entry.def: If someone is indicted for a crime, they are officially charged with it.

example.ex: He was later indicted on corruption charges...
She has been indicted for possessing cocaine...

auth_sentence.content: But that doesn't indict the entire German people.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that doesn't indict the entire German people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that doesn't indict the entire German people.

auth_sentence.content: He was quicker to indict the political class.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was quicker to indict the political class.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was quicker to indict the political class.

auth_sentence.content: The next step is to completely indict one of them.
auth_sentence.res_content: The next step is to completely indict one of them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The next step is to completely indict one of them.

dict说话,断言,写+ion状态→说话状态→措辞

dict说话,断言,写+um→说[出]的话→格言
e出+dict说话,断言,写→说出→布告

vale再见+dict说话,断言,写+ion表名词→说再见

sentences.en: If the grand jury indicts the suspect, he will go to trial.
sentences.cn: 如果大陪审团指控嫌疑犯, 他就得上法庭。
